thread.title: Live updates for Jan. 2 in Mississauga, Brampton and Caledon
thread.title_full: Live updates for Jan. 2 in Mississauga, Brampton and Caledon

author: Louie Rosella
title: Live updates for Jan. 2 in Mississauga, Brampton and Caledon
text: Happy New Year Mississauga, Brampton and Caledon. It's Tuesday, Jan. 2 and here are some traffic and weather updates for the region, along with our top stories. WEATHER Sunny in Mississauga, Brampton and Caledon with a high of 2 degrees Celsius: TRAFFIC Drivers can "expect delays" of up to 10 minutes on Highway 403, south of Highway 401 in Mississauga, due to construction. You might be interested in [Ontario 511](https://511on.ca/list/events/traffic?start=0&length=25&order%5Bi%5D=7&order%5Bdir%5D=asc) has all the latest info on highway crashes and closures each morning. TRANSIT Hereâ€™s what you need to know to get to your destination on time. Brampton Transit: Click [here](https://transit55.ca/brampton/map/) for real-time bus tracking. Mississauga Transit: Click [here](https://transit55.ca/mississauga/map/) for the most up-to-date tracking. Metrolinx: For details on GO service, click [here](https://www.gotransit.com/en/service-updates/construction-notices). NEED GAS THIS MORNING? Here are the cheapest prices at the pump in [Brampton](https://www.gasbuddy.com/gasprices/ontario/brampton), [Caledon](https://www.gasbuddy.com/gasprices/ontario/caledon) and [Mississauga](https://www.gasbuddy.com/gasprices/ontario/mississauga), according to [Gasbuddy.com](https://www.gasbuddy.com/). TOP STORIES Mississauga: Some of the top issues facing Peel in 2024: [https://www.mississauga.com/news/council/here-are-some-of-the-top-issues-facing-peel-region-for-2024/article_7f81f2fd-be2a-5ba8-8d45-af5282971f68.html](https://www.mississauga.com/news/council/here-are-some-of-the-top-issues-facing-peel-region-for-2024/article_7f81f2fd-be2a-5ba8-8d45-af5282971f68.html) Brampton: Mayor Patrick Brown wants to see fines for inappropriate 911 calls: [https://www.bramptonguardian.com/news/brampton-mayor-patrick-brown-would-like-to-see-fines-for-inappropriate-911-calls/article_24c5ca91-839d-5d77-85a0-073b0eec85af.html](https://www.bramptonguardian.com/news/brampton-mayor-patrick-brown-would-like-to-see-fines-for-inappropriate-911-calls/article_24c5ca91-839d-5d77-85a0-073b0eec85af.html) Caledon: What we know and don't know about a triple shooting in Caledon: [https://www.caledonenterprise.com/news/crime/what-we-know-what-we-don-t-know-about-triple-shooting-in-caledon/article_ad59b728-f226-585e-9df6-93435ee58171.html](https://www.caledonenterprise.com/news/crime/what-we-know-what-we-don-t-know-about-triple-shooting-in-caledon/article_ad59b728-f226-585e-9df6-93435ee58171.html)
